item.title: PhishNet - Office 365
item.description: PhishNet - Office 365 Beta PhishNET is an add-in button that helps users to submit directly to Area 1 phish samples missed by Area 1’s detection. PhishNet avoids the previous process, where users had to report phish to their email admins, which then had to manually download and forward the sample to Area 1. ​â€‹ Prerequisites To set up PhishNet with Office 365, you will need: An Area 1 account with admin access.
